cookieAuth.description: Session cookie set after OAuth authentication
cookieAuth.name: _backend_session

info.description:
REST API for the open-source mobile backend service.

## Authentication

Most endpoints require authentication via session cookie.
Use the OAuth endpoints (`/auth/:provider`) to authenticate.

## Versioning

New clients should use `/api/v1/*` routes.
Compatibility routes are also available at `/api/*`.

## Rate Limiting

API requests are rate-limited. If you exceed the limit,
you'll receive a 429 Too Many Requests response.

## Errors

Errors follow a consistent format:

```json
{
  "error": "Validation failed",
  "code": "validation_failed",
  "message": "Validation failed",
  "request_id": "F3n9Zz...",
  "details": { ... }
}
```
info.title: Mobile Backend API
